name.ja: <ruby>終刻獄徒<rt>ドゥームズ・ブレイク</rt></ruby> ディアクトロス
name.zh-CN: 终刻狱徒 迪亚克特罗斯

text.en:
2 Level 4 monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can destroy 1 "Doom-Z" card in your hand or face-up field, then you can destroy 1 monster on the field. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect while it has a "Doom-Z" monster or "Medius the Pure" as material: You can add to your hand, or send to the GY, 1 Equip Spell from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Doom-Z Break Diactorus" once per turn.
